post.text: Americans are sick and tired of the pay-to-play politics in Washington. It is time to END Hillary's government corruption and to bring new leadership that puts AMERICA FIRST! #DrainTheSwamp

comment.author: Ashley
comment.text: DONALD TRUMP'S RAPE TRIAL BEGINS DECEMBER 16TH.
